name: @akiojin/generate-mac-installer-github-action
description: This action creates an installer (.pkg) for macOS.

scripts.build: npm install && ncc build src/main.ts --license licenses.txt
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf node_modules && npm cache clean --force
